body.directions: Read each word or phrase in Chinese; then answer the question that follows.

body.quiz: Which of the following sentences can be best completed with the word presented?
body.answer: 我姐姐星期六_____桌子。Wǒ jiěji exīngqīliù_____zhuōzi.
options: 她今天上午_____毛衣。Tā jīntiān shàngwǔ_____máoyī.
body.correct: Job excellently done! 擦 cā means “to wipe,” and it can best complete the sentence 我姐姐星期六擦桌子。Wǒ jiějie xīngqīliù cā zhuōzi. (My older sister wipes the table on Saturdays.)
body.incorrect: Almost. Identify the meaning of the word, and then try it with the sentences in the choices to see which one fits the best.

body.quiz: Which of the following furniture items serves the most similar function in a house as the item indicated by the word presented?
body.correct: Job excellently done! The word 扶手椅 fúshǒuyǐ means “armchair.” It is for sitting on, and so is a 沙发 shāfā (sofa).
body.incorrect: Not quite. Think about the meaning of the word. Consider its function in a house, and then review the items in the choices to see which one serves a similar function.

body.quiz: In which season is the item in the audio most commonly used?
body.answer: Audio for 夏天 xiàtiān (summer)
options: Audio for 春天 chūntiān (spring)
Audio for 秋天 qiūtiān (autumn)
Audio for 冬天 dōngtiān (winter)
body.correct: Outstanding! 电扇 diànshàn means “fan,” which is most commonly used during summer.
body.incorrect: Almost! First identify the meaning of the word presented, and then consider in what type of weather it is most commonly used.
